price: Abamalayika na bo bazoba bari ku mfuruka zaryo. Abamalayika umunani b’ibihangange bazoba bareruye hejuru yabo Ubuhangamo bw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah;
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ

meta.transliteration: wal-malaku ʿalā arjāihā wayaḥmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyatun
